title: Luxury unit in Lakeshore East--w/d in unit and 24 hr doorman
posting_body: QR Code Link to This Post   Interested in this property?  Click on: Reply to this listing for more information  ** if you are texting us, please include the link to the listing so we can identify what you are inquiring on  This amazing luxury hi rise building is located in the heart of Lake Shore East, just a step away from the Lake. This  building is just steps off of Michigan Ave, the Lake and Navy Pier. Take advantage of this awesome convertible unit now.  Pets are OK. Designated floors available for dogs (subject to availability). Garage parking extra. Utilities included in rent.    This building has fabulous country club style amenities including: -Spectacular lake, river and city views -Spacious floor plans -24 hour doorman -Outdoor pool and spa -State of the art full fitness center -Game room and glamorous party room for you and your guests -Sky garden lounge overlooking the lake and the city with a complimentary coffee bar and spacious seating to relax   This completely upgraded unit is available immediately and offers a contemporary feel with dramatic finishes including: -Washer/Dryer -Ceramic tile entry -Impala black granite islands with cherry cabinetry -Floor to ceiling windows with unbelievable views -Select units offer balconies and bay windows too   Velocity Apartment Group  312-253-7403 *****For faster response from one of our Agents, please provide your cell phone number, move date and email address when inquiring.  Thank you.  Availability and pricing may change at any time without notice. Ads subject to errors and omissions. Please contact agent for additional questions and information.  Interested in this property? Click REPLY above and email us  ** if you are texting us, please include the link to the listing so we can identify what you are inquiring on
